location: A room in the Garter Inn.

lines.text: Enter Host and SIMPLE

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: What wouldst thou have, boor? what: thick-skin? speak, breathe, discuss; brief, short, quick, snap.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: Marry, sir, I come to speak with Sir John Falstaff from Master Slender.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: There's his chamber, his house, his castle, his standing-bed and truckle-bed; 'tis painted about with the story of the Prodigal, fresh and new. Go knock and call; hell speak like an Anthropophaginian unto thee: knock, I say.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: There's an old woman, a fat woman, gone up into his chamber: I'll be so bold as stay, sir, till she come down; I come to speak with her, indeed.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Ha! a fat woman! the knight may be robbed: I'll call. Bully knight! bully Sir John! speak from thy lungs military: art thou there? it is thine host, thine Ephesian, calls.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: [Above]  How now, mine host!

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Here's a Bohemian-Tartar tarries the coming down of thy fat woman. Let her descend, bully, let her descend; my chambers are honourable: fie! privacy? fie!
Enter FALSTAFF

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: There was, mine host, an old fat woman even now with me;  but she's gone.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: Pray you, sir, was't not the wise woman of Brentford?

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: Ay, marry, was it, mussel-shell: what would you with her?

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: My master, sir, Master Slender, sent to her, seeing her go through the streets, to know, sir, whether one Nym, sir, that beguiled him of a chain, had the chain or no.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: I spake with the old woman about it.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: And what says she, I pray, sir?

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: Marry, she says that the very same man that beguiled Master Slender of his chain cozened him of it.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: I would I could have spoken with the woman herself; I had other things to have spoken with her too from him.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: What are they? let us know.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Ay, come; quick.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: I may not conceal them, sir.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Conceal them, or thou diest.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: Why, sir, they were nothing but about Mistress Anne Page; to know if it were my master's fortune to have her or no.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: 'Tis, 'tis his fortune.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: What, sir?

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: To have her, or no. Go; say the woman told me so.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: May I be bold to say so, sir?

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: Ay, sir; like who more bold.

lines.speaker: simple
lines.text: I thank your worship: I shall make my master glad with these tidings.
Exit

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Thou art clerkly, thou art clerkly, Sir John. Was there a wise woman with thee?

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: Ay, that there was, mine host; one that hath taught me more wit than ever I learned before in my life; and I paid nothing for it neither, but was paid for my learning.
Enter BARDOLPH

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Out, alas, sir! cozenage, mere cozenage!

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Where be my horses? speak well of them, varletto.

lines.speaker: bardolph
lines.text: Run away with the cozeners; for so soon as I came beyond Eton, they threw me off from behind one of them, in a slough of mire; and set spurs and away, like three German devils, three Doctor Faustuses.

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: They are gone but to meet the duke, villain: do not say they be fled; Germans are honest men.
Enter SIR HUGH EVANS

lines.speaker: sir hugh evans
lines.text: Where is mine host?

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: What is the matter, sir?

lines.speaker: sir hugh evans
lines.text: Have a care of your entertainments: there is a friend of mine come to town tells me there is three cozen-germans that has cozened all the hosts of Readins, of Maidenhead, of Colebrook, of horses and money. I tell you for good will, look you: you are wise and full of gibes and vlouting-stocks, and 'tis not convenient you should be cozened. Fare you well.
Exit
Enter DOCTOR CAIUS

lines.speaker: doctor caius
lines.text: Vere is mine host de Jarteer?

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Here, master doctor, in perplexity and doubtful dilemma.

lines.speaker: doctor caius
lines.text: I cannot tell vat is dat: but it is tell-a me dat you make grand preparation for a duke de Jamany: by my trot, dere is no duke dat the court is know to come. I tell you for good vill: adieu.
Exit

lines.speaker: host
lines.text: Hue and cry, villain, go! Assist me, knight. I am undone! Fly, run, hue and cry, villain! I am undone!
Exeunt Host and BARDOLPH

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: I would all the world might be cozened; for I have been cozened and beaten too. If it should come to the ear of the court, how I have been transformed and how my transformation hath been washed and cudgelled, they would melt me out of my fat drop by drop and liquor fishermen's boots with me; I warrant they would whip me with their fine wits till I were as crest-fallen as a dried pear. I never prospered since I forswore myself at primero. Well, if my wind were but long enough to say my prayers, I would repent. Now, whence come you?
Enter MISTRESS QUICKLY

lines.speaker: mistress quickly
lines.text: From the two parties, forsooth.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: The devil take one party and his dam the other! and so they shall be both bestowed. I have suffered more for their sakes, more than the villanous inconstancy of man's disposition is able to bear.

lines.speaker: mistress quickly
lines.text: And have not they suffered? Yes, I warrant; speciously one of them; Mistress Ford, good heart, is beaten black and blue, that you cannot see a white spot about her.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: What tellest thou me of black and blue? I was beaten myself into all the colours of the rainbow; and I was like to be apprehended for the witch of Brentford: but that my admirable dexterity of wit, my counterfeiting the action of an old woman, delivered me, the knave constable had set me i' the stocks, i' the common stocks, for a witch.

lines.speaker: mistress quickly
lines.text: Sir, let me speak with you in your chamber: you shall hear how things go; and, I warrant, to your content. Here is a letter will say somewhat. Good hearts, what ado here is to bring you together! Sure, one of you does not serve heaven well, that you are so crossed.

lines.speaker: falstaff
lines.text: Come up into my chamber.
Exeunt
